qas.question: Can one travel by plane from any country in Myanmar ?

answers.text: Flights are available from most countries

qas.question: Is there anyway to decrease travel time in getting to Myanmar ?

answers.text: direct flights are limited to mainly Thai and other ASEAN airlines

qas.question: Has the travel industry considered making changes to fight plans for Myanmar ?

answers.text: 5 international airlines and increasing numbers of airlines have began launching direct flights from Japan, Qatar, Taiwan, South Korea, Germany and Singapore.

qas.question: What airlines travel to Myanmar that currently has development plans towards expanding ?

answers.text: Thailand-based Nok Air and Business Airlines and Singapore-based Tiger Airline".

context: <a0_0>Flights are available from most countries<a0_0/>, though <a1_0>direct flights are limited to mainly Thai and other ASEAN airlines<a1_0/>. According to Eleven magazine, "In the past, there were only 1<a2_0>5 international airlines and increasing numbers of airlines have began launching direct flights from Japan, Qatar, Taiwan, South Korea, Germany and Singapore.<a2_0/>" Expansions were expected in September 2013, but yet again are mainly Thai and other Asian-based airlines according to Eleven Media Group's Eleven, "<a3_0>Thailand-based Nok Air and Business Airlines and Singapore-based Tiger Airline".
